We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private NormalizedAverageTrueRange _natr;
// In Initialize()
_natr = NATR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_natr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Is Ready", _natr.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Warm Up Period", _natr.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Current", _natr.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Name", _natr.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Samples", _natr.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.natr = self.NATR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.natr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Is Ready", self.natr.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Warm Up Period", self.natr.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Current", self.natr.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Name", self.natr.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "NATR Samples", self.natr.Samples);
